short_summary: Purchase of custom-made boxes for the Department of Health Canada.
description: This contract is for the purchase of custom boxes for the Department of Health Canada. The delivery location is at National Dosimetry Services (NDS) of the Department of Health Canada located in Ottawa. Suppliers responsible for delivery. This contract includes a trading agreement with multiple countries, such as the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), etc. The contract is expected to start on May 31, 2023, and end on March 31, 2027. The procurement method is competitive- open bidding. The lowest price will be the selection criteria. The contract is subjected to trading agreements, public procurement regulations, and labor laws. The procument committee will process the bids. The bid must be submitted on July 12th, 2023, by 2pm EDT. All offers submitted after this date will be declared non-responsive.
duration_in_months: It is expected that the contract will last for 46 month
